title: The Simpsons: Tapped Out v4.18.2 (Mega Mod) (READ INFO)
description:
Mod :
+ Infinite Money
+ Infinite Donuts
+ Ban-Protection
+ Your account will not be stuck with billions of donuts (no server-sync)!
+ Free Shopping
+ Your existing donuts will stay!
+ Get permanent bonus donuts!

- The cheats work in Krustlyland!
- The cheats work after all the latest ingame updates (clientside mod)!
- The cheats work with and without origin login!

Okay, some good news and some bad news.

Bad news first: EA has put quite some work into this update. The game internal structures has changed and some methods appear to be encrypted now. This makes it hard for me to write the same old client-side mod for this update.

Now for the good news: I successfully modded SOME parts of the game. Which means we can still enjoy the mod - at least to some degree.

Free shopping and permanent bonus donuts for rushing is working.
If you run out of donuts or get a message saying you need more donuts: close the game, remove it from your "Recent Apps" list and restart it. The amount should be untouched all the time and your donuts will be back to the amount when you first started the mod.

Or just go to neighbors town and come back, donuts will be back

So, technically, we still have unlimited everything, it just works a different way now
